alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 6:27PM CDT until July 14 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Bourbon County in southeastern Kansas... Eastern Crawford County in southeastern Kansas... Barton County in southwestern Missouri... Northern Newton County in southwestern Missouri... Vernon County in west central Missouri... Jasper County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Fulton to 6 miles north of Arcadia to near Mindenmines to near Weir, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Joplin, Pittsburg, Carthage, Webb City, Prairie State Park, Nevada, Fort Scott, Carl Junction, Lamar, Frontenac, Galena, Girard, Oronogo, Carterville, Duquesne, Arma, Sarcoxie, Duenweg, Jasper and Diamond. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 32. Interstate 49 between mile markers 30 and 104. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
